channel.title: Pi editing thieve stalls help
channel.description: i need some help editing the thieve stall on a pi serv. they currently give 1 item and you sell once you get a full env i want it to give cash on each stall. i was looking around and all i could find was in actionhandler.java i found this this is the last thieve stall its the item that it gives [code] case 2562: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1613, 170, 90); break;[/code] 1613 is the item id but thats just the item id there is no stall id or anything not even a amount id. im sure this is a easy fix somehow but idk how it works pleas help rep+

item.title: Pi editing thieve stalls help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

i need some help editing the thieve stall on a pi serv.
they currently give 1 item and you sell once you get a full env i want it to give cash on each stall.
i was looking around and all i could find was in actionhandler.java i found this
this is the last thieve stall its the item that it gives

case 2562: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1613, 170, 90); break;
1613 is the item id
but thats just the item id there is no stall id or anything not even a amount id. im sure this is a easy fix somehow but idk how it works pleas help rep+

Read full topic
